mapper.select: SELECT a.material_id, (select scheduled_date from material_process where line_id in (select line_id from line where in_advance = 8 and line_id != 13) and material_id = a.material_id) as dec_plan_date, (select finish_date from material_process where line_id in (select line_id from line where in_advance = 8 and line_id != 13) and material_id = a.material_id) as dec_finish_date, (select scheduled_date from material_process where line_id=13 and material_id = a.material_id) as ns_plan_date, (select finish_date from material_process where line_id=13 and material_id = a.material_id) as ns_finish_date, (select scheduled_date from material_process where line_id in (select line_id from line where in_advance = 0) and material_id = a.material_id) as com_plan_date, (select finish_date from material_process where line_id in (select line_id from line where in_advance = 0) and material_id = a.material_id) as com_finish_date from material_process a where a.material_id = #{id} limit 1
SELECT material_id, scheduled_date, scheduled_assign_date, finish_date from material_process mp where mp.material_id = #{material_id} and mp.line_id = #{line_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE material_process SET finish_date = current_date where material_id = #{material_id} and line_id=#{line_id} AND finish_date IS NULL;
mapper.delete: DELETE from material_process WHERE material_id = #{material_id} AND finish_date IS NULL;
